body_html:
Hi,

I think I have the same issue; I cannot find the many .h files needed to compile via C/C++ api and apparently generated by cc_op_gen (the first of which is array_ops.h).

@cg31: how can I run Bazel to generate the ops files? What command should I use?
I've tried "bazel build cc_ops" (while inside the cc folder), but that didn't seem work.

I'm sorry if the question is silly - I'm a tensorflow/bazel newbie...

Daniele
